panel控件

\n

panel控件

\n

如何使用

\n

暂无

\n

示例

\n

##head和foot具有的panel

\n
\n
\n \n
\n
\n

Panel Heading

\n
\n
\n

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Fusce velit\n tortor, dictum in gravida nec, aliquet non lorem. pellentesque.ipiscing\n elit. Fusce velit tortor.

\n
\n
Panel Footer
\n
\n \n
\n
\n
.content{\n background: #eceff1;\n padding: 10px;\n}\n.panel-example{\n width: 60%;\n margin-left: 15%;\n margin-top: 40px;\n}
\n
\n
<div class="panel-example">\n <!-- Example Panel With All -->\n <div class="u-panel u-panel-bordered">\n <div class="u-panel-heading">\n <h3 class="u-panel-title">Panel Heading</h3>\n </div>\n <div class="u-panel-body">\n <p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Fusce velit\n tortor, dictum in gravida nec, aliquet non lorem. pellentesque.ipiscing\n elit. Fusce velit tortor.</P>\n </div>\n <div class="u-panel-footer">Panel Footer</div>\n </div>\n <!-- End Example Panel With All -->\n</div>
\n
\n\n

##只有body的panel

\n
\n
\n \n
\n
\n

Heading With Desc\n Panel Description Here..\n

\n
\n
\n

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Fusce velit\n tortor, dictum in gravida nec, aliquet non lorem. pellentesque.ipiscing\n elit. Fusce velit tortor.

\n
\n
\n \n
\n
\n
.content{\n background: #eceff1;\n padding: 10px;\n}\n.panel-example{\n width: 60%;\n margin-left: 15%;\n margin-top: 40px;\n}
\n
\n
<div class="panel-example">\n <!-- Example Heading With Desc -->\n <div class="u-panel">\n <div class="u-panel-heading">\n <h3 class="u-panel-title">Heading With Desc\n <small>Panel Description Here..</small>\n </h3>\n </div>\n <div class="u-panel-body">\n <p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Fusce velit\n tortor, dictum in gravida nec, aliquet non lorem. pellentesque.ipiscing\n elit. Fusce velit tortor.</P>\n </div>\n </div>\n <!-- End Example Heading With Desc -->\n</div>
\n
\n\n

##只有footer的panel

\n
\n
\n \n
\n
\n

Body Heading

\n

Wrap buttons or secondary text in .panel-footer. Note\n that panel footers do not inherit colors and borders when using\n contextual variations as they are not meant to be in the foreground.

\n
\n
Panel Footer
\n
\n \n
\n
\n
.content{\n background: #eceff1;\n padding: 10px;\n}\n.panel-example{\n width: 60%;\n margin-left: 15%;\n margin-top: 40px;\n}
\n
\n
<div class="panel-example">\n <!-- Example Panel With Footer -->\n <div class="u-panel u-panel-bordered">\n <div class="u-panel-body">\n <h4>Body Heading</h4>\n <p>Wrap buttons or secondary text in <code>.panel-footer</code>. Note\n that panel footers do not inherit colors and borders when using\n contextual variations as they are not meant to be in the foreground.</p>\n </div>\n <div class="u-panel-footer">Panel Footer</div>\n </div>\n <!-- End Example Panel With Footer -->\n</div>
\n
\n\n

##只有head的panel

\n
\n
\n \n
\n
\n

Panel Heading

\n
\n
\n

Body Heading

\n

Easily add a heading container to your panel with .u-panel-heading.\n You may also include any <h1>-<h6> with a .panel-title class to add a pre-styled heading.

\n

For proper link coloring, be sure to place links in headings within\n .u-panel-title.

\n
\n
\n \n
\n
\n
.content{\n background: #eceff1;\n padding: 10px;\n}\n.panel-example{\n width: 60%;\n margin-left: 15%;\n margin-top: 40px;\n}
\n
\n
<div class="panel-example">\n <!-- Example Panel With Heading -->\n <div class="u-panel u-panel-bordered">\n <div class="u-panel-heading">\n <h3 class="u-panel-title">Panel Heading</h3>\n </div>\n <div class="u-panel-body">\n <h4>Body Heading</h4>\n <p>Easily add a heading container to your panel with <code>.u-panel-heading</code>.\n You may also include any <code><h1></code>-<code><h6></code> with a <code>.panel-title</code> class to add a pre-styled heading.</p>\n <p>For proper link coloring, be sure to place links in headings within\n <code>.u-panel-title</code>.</p>\n </div>\n </div>\n <!-- End Example Panel With Heading -->\n</div>
\n
